descriptionHtml:
when i saw the Bonemold helmet the first thing that popped in my mind was that it looked similar to a Zaku\'s head from Gundam so i made this re-texture just for the heck of it, i also made a standalone version for people who doesn\'t want replacers

= Installation
- Download Main File and extract the .ZIP or .RAR archive with Winrar, 7zip or any similar tool of your choice
- Open the folder you just extracted and copy the TEXTURES folder and .ESP file over to your Skyrim Data folder in
(:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data)
or
(:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data)
- Activate the ESP with either the game\'s default launcher or using Nexus Mod Manager 

= Features / Content
- Standalone Armor version
- Retexture Armor replacer version

= Crafting Requirements
- Orcish Smithing Perk
- Bone Meal
- Netch Leather
- Orichalcum Ingot
- Iron Ingot

= Requirements
- Dragonborn DLC

=== Check out these sites to find more of my mods and video demos ===
http://www.youtube.com/user/gh0strec0n141
http://ghostrecon123skyrimmods.blogspot.com/
author: ghostrecon123
